verses.plain: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.

tokens.t: My soul shall make her boast in the

verses.plain: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.

tokens.t: with me, and let us exalt his name together.

verses.plain: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

tokens.t: , and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

verses.plain: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.

tokens.t: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.

verses.plain: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.

tokens.t: This poor man cried, and the
, and saved him out of all his troubles.

verses.plain: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

tokens.t: encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

verses.plain: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

tokens.t: O taste and see that the

verses.plain: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

tokens.t: no want to them that fear him.

verses.plain: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.

tokens.t: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the

verses.plain: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.

tokens.t: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the

verses.plain: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?

tokens.t: days, that he may see good?

verses.plain: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

tokens.t: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

verses.plain: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

tokens.t: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

verses.plain: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

tokens.t: upon the righteous, and his ears

verses.plain: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

tokens.t: against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

verses.plain: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

tokens.t: heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

verses.plain: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

tokens.t: nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

verses.plain: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.

tokens.t: the afflictions of the righteous: but the
delivereth him out of them all.

verses.plain: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.

tokens.t: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.

verses.plain: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.

tokens.t: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.

verses.plain: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.

tokens.t: redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.

footnotes.text: were lightened: or, they flowed unto him
unto…: Heb. to the broken of heart
of a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit
